name: Better Call Saul
description: Six years before Saul Goodman meets Walter White. We meet him when the man who will become Saul Goodman is known as Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer.

name: Friends
description: The misadventures of a group of friends as they navigate the pitfalls of work, life and love in Manhattan.

name: Grey's Anatomy
description: Follows the personal and professional lives of a group of doctors at Seattleâ€™s Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital.

name: Vikings
description: The series tells the sagas of Ragnar's band of Viking brothers and his family, as he rises to become King of the Viking tribes.
